scripts.dev: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8092 && echo fs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288 | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf && sudo sysctl -p && vuepress dev src
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8092 && echo fs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288 | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf && sudo sysctl -p && vuepress build src
